name: HexHiv
description:
FOR THE OPTIMAL EXPERIENCE:

    make it full-screen on the bottom right

    or

    visit the official site: https://hexhiv.com/

Goal: own the most tiles by the end of the game

Everything including the rules is intuitively designed on the page (https://hexhiv.com/),  otherwise continue reading.

To read the rules and learn how to play visit the rules page (https://hexhiv.com/rules).

To play the game you may simply create a game (https://hexhiv.com/create-game) or join a game already made by entering that game's URL or by queuing (https://hexhiv.com/play). 

You may also make your own map here (https://hexhiv.com/create-map).
